title: 4 people shot in West Memphis drive-by
content:
WEST MEMPHIS, AR (WMC) -
Four people were shot in a drive-by in West Memphis.
Three of those victims were taken to the hospital with minor injuries. The fourth victim is in critical condition.
The shooting happened at the corner of 13th Street and Tyler Avenue.
Police Chief Donald Oakes said the four were standing outside a home when someone drove by and shot at them. Oakes said the victims then started shooting back.
Police believe there may be other victims that were grazed in the shooting.
